title: Design for Citibank/Citicorp Stationery
description: Sketch depicting 16 designs of various pieces of Citibank stationery. Contains designs for 8 pieces of letterhead, 4 envelopes, 3 business cards, and 1bank statement. 12 sketches are rendered in graphite, remaining 4 in graphite with blue and orange color pencil. Each design contains slight variations in placement of logo and other information.
name: drawing
